items.name: power
items.description: Determines the energy consumed by the mote for communication.

items.name: spreading_factor
items.description: Determines the duration of the communication

items.description: The sampling rate of the sensors of the mote.

items.description: The movement speed of the mote.

items.description: The energy level of the mote.
